ygData.subject: Re: Illusion Cards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... he All ways Drops one right in front of BB when he gets there sometimes he picks it back up .. Its for  quest in Fp. -- Jamie Macdonald A.K.A Magis
ygData.messageBody:
Phillip Ratliff wrote:

> From: Phillip Ratliff <p_ratliff@...>
>
> Ok I'm trying to do the Illusion card quest in Qeynos Hills. I found
> one card just laying on the ground. Who drops them and when? I thought
> it was a guard, but do I just follow him around hoping he drops it or something?
>

he All ways Drops one right in front of BB when he gets there sometimes he picks it
back up .. Its for quest in Fp.




--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
